Steven Chigorimbo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1951) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi

O nwere ihe nrite na ihe nkiri mba ụwa dịka Slavers, The Lost City of Gold, King Solomon's Mine, Jake Speed, Incident at Victoria Falls, Quartermaine na Cry Freedom. Na Zimbabwe, ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na soapie na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, Studio 263, nke ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ya.
Chigorimbo tolitere na Highfield Township, nke a na-ewere dịka ebe obibi nke ịhụ mba n'anya na Zimbabwe
A zụlitere nkà ya maka ime ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri ụka ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ
Ọ lụrụ di ma gbaa alụkwaghịm ugboro atọ
O nwere ụmụ iri na anọ.

N'ime ogologo ọrụ ya, nke malitere na mbido afọ 1970, a na-ewere Chigorimbo dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Zimbabwe. O sonyere na ihe karịrị otu narị ọrụ ihe nkiri nke gụnyere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na ihe ngosi, yana ihe nkiri soapie. N'afọ 2006, Zimbabwe International Film Festival Trust nyere Chigorimbo onyinye ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke mba ahụ. Site na ahụmịhe ya sara mbara, Chigorimbo anọwo na-alụ ọgụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri siri ike.
